ResourceHeader.ResourceName: EISCAT CP2 ESR Steerable Antenna (Raw Ne)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP2 raw electron density from the ESR (32 m) Steerable Antenna.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP2  ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3
